reviews.review: Кооп - это, когда с помощью куба приломления жгёшь лазером своего напарника
A masterpiece

Cannot stress how good this game is.
After finishing singleplayer , you can play co-op with another friend (which makes the game 2x fun)
This game also comes with Portal MEL stories which is kind of a community made extension to the game.

Not the mention this game is dirt cheap (especially during a sale)
this game is a must try.
cool

It's been a very long time since I've replayed portal 2... it is still a fantastic game... the humor is great! The game play is great! The world of Portal has the best mixture of cute, creepy, and confusing, of any series I've had the pleasure of playing! Thanks Valve!

Recién comienzo esta segunda edición y debo decir que no solo se han mejorado cuestiones de la jugabilidad, sino también se explora muchísimo más la creatividad de los puzzles, y es acompañado de una exquisita trama que da lugar a un alto grado de inmersión. En cuanto a lo superficial, se destaca cómo se logran los detalles de las superficies y la profundidad que se genera con luces y sombras, además, respecto a su versión anterior, los diversos indicios que se dan están mucho mejor logrados, uno por ejemplo es mediante el sistema de pictogramas que indican las acciones a realizar.
Brilliantly engaging. A must-play for anyone who likes their minds stimulated.

platforming, multiplayer friendly, valve classic portal 2 and 1 are highly recommended by me and many others for it's high quality. There simply is not enough letter space in the review box to give you my full opinion about this game so go play it for yourself at an amazing price
The game is fun and gets proggresively harder as the levels go on. Also i have a crush on the potato robot

Do you have a friend? Do you like co-op games with that friend? Do you like using your brain to figure out stuff? Then why are you reading this stupid review and not playing Portal 2 with your friend instead?

An excellent puzzle platformer that surpasses its predecessor with an enriching story that is told through in-game characters and the environment, prompting you to actually care about WHERE you are playing beyond where you are placing portals. Great clean humor that all ages can appreciate and it is sure to leave a lasting impression on you as it has for me.

Лучшая игра для коопа, искали игру для совместного прохождения.
